what: Apply Bootstrap brand to base, lattice and ggplot2 graphics — brand_on
title: Apply Bootstrap brand to base, lattice and ggplot2 graphics — brand_on
text: Applies Bootstrap branding R graphics using thematic R package utilities. function behaves like thematic::thematic_on() instead passing individual colors fonts, user can provide external _brand.yml configuration file. brand_on takes color font variable names per Boostrap branding (hence, provide hex color codes, edit _brand.yml instead).

title: Apply Bootstrap brand to base, lattice and ggplot2 graphics — brand_on
code: brand_on(   file = NULL,   bg = "background",   fg = "foreground",   accent = c("primary", "secondary"),   font = "monospace-inline",   sequential = NULL,   qualitative = NULL,   gradient = c("orange", "light", "green"),   n = 20,   alpha = 0.9,   ... )

title: Apply Bootstrap brand to base, lattice and ggplot2 graphics — brand_on
